#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   char s[1005];
   int x;
   cin>>x;
   getchar();
   cin.getline(s,1005);
   for(int i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
   {
     if(s[i]=='W')
        x=(x*2)+11;
     else
     {
        if(x%2==0)
            x=x/2;
        else
           x=(x/2)+1;
     }
   }
   cout<<x<<endl;
   return 0;
}
